name: Samantha Wildman
bio: Samantha Wildman is Group Client Director and a Board Director at MPA, where she leads the firm’s client strategy and works closely with scaling businesses across the UK. With over a decade of experience advising founders and senior leaders, Samantha brings a practical, commercially focused approach to unlocking funding, overcoming growth barriers, and building investor-ready operations. She has particular expertise in supporting tech and innovation-led businesses, drawing on a background in funding, security, and technology sectors. Samantha’s role at MPA places her at the centre of strategic conversations around business growth, ensuring founders receive the proactive guidance they need to scale sustainably and confidently prepare for investment or exit.
